review: We recently got our free Fire TV Stick in a promotion with Sling TV, as we wanted to watch the NBA playoffs on ESPN and TNT, and weren't happy with cable TV.  I'm not sure if it's the Fire TV Stick or Sling's app on the stick, but we get frequent stalls, swirly circles and "buffering" problems... and while watching the playoffs it naturally happens during something important.  It happens on other channels too, it's just that we're watching mostly NBA right now.  I wish I could say it's the internet connection, but streaming on our laptop from Youtube, Amazon and Netflix are perfect, with good resolution.  Right now I wouldn't recommend to a friend, but I feel some of these problems may be worked out when we all get past the "beta" stage.  As for now... not happy.
